## Lifecycle Event

Which event should this affect? (e.g., PreToolUse, PostToolUse, SessionStart, Stop)

## What It Should Enforce

Describe the engineering practice or behavior you want enforced.

## Current Behavior

What happens today without this feature?

## Proposed Behavior

What should happen with this feature?

## Enforcement Style

How should violations be handled?

- [ ] **Deny** — hard block, tool call fails
- [ ] **Rewrite** — transparently fix the command
- [ ] **Advisory** — warn but allow
- [ ] **Escalating** — warn first, block on repeat

## Alternatives Considered

Other approaches you've thought about and why this one is better.
